idea-plugin.name: Timestamp Generator
idea-plugin.description:
A timestamp generator.

For example: 2019-03-18T11:30:00.000Z.

Available actions:
  • Generate Timestamp
  • Generate Timestamp to clipboard

Available formats:
  • ISO 8601
  • ISO Local Offset DateTime
  • ISO Local Date
  • ISO Local Time
  • ISO Local Date Time
  • ISO Instant
  • RFC 1123 Date Time
  • ISO Zoned Date Time
  • Epoch Seconds
  • Epoch Milliseconds
